property.name: Text
property.value: Easy / Standard α: -2. This token has an additional -1 for each Innocent Reveler underneath the agenda deck. β: Reveal another token. If you fail this test, draw the top card of the encounter deck. γ: -3. If you fail, deal 1 damage or 1 horror to the nearest Innocent Reveler in play. δ: -4. If you fail and Cnidathqua is in play, it attacks you.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hard / Expert α: -2. This token has an additional -1 for each Innocent Reveler underneath the act or agenda decks. β: Reveal another token. If you fail this test, draw the top card of the encounter deck. γ: -4. Deal 1 damage or 1 horror to the nearest Innocent Reveler in play. δ: -6. If you fail and Cnidathqua is in play, it attacks you.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Spawn - The nearest location with no investigators counter-clockwise from the lead investigator.Hunter. Retaliate.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - After Baleful Reveler moves from the hunter keyword, reveal a random token from the chaos bag. If you reveal a α, β, γ, δ, or ζ symbol, resolve its hunter keyword again. (Limit once per round.)

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Spawn - The nearest location with no investigators counter-clockwise from the lead investigator.Hunter. Retaliate.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - After Baleful Reveler moves from the hunter keyword, reveal a random token from the chaos bag. If you reveal a α, β, γ, δ, or ζ symbol, resolve its hunter keyword again. (Limit once per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: If there are 1 or more Masked Carnevale-Goers in play, the lead investigator chooses 1 and flips it to its other side. If its other side is an Innocent Reveler, place it underneath the agenda deck. If there is still a Masked Carnevale-Goer in play, flip this agenda back to agenda 2a. Otherwise, advance to agenda 3a.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - After a Writhing Appendage enters play: Place 2 doom on it.

property.name: Text
property.value: In player order, Cnidathqua attacks each investigator in play, regardless of their location. Damage and horror from these attacks must be assigned to an Innocent Reveler first, if able. Then, flip this agenda back to agenda 3a.

property.name: Text
property.value: η The investigators spend 1π clues, as a group: Look at the other side of a Masked Carnevale-Goer at any location. Objective - If there are a total of 3 Innocent Revelers underneath the act and/or agenda decks, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put the set-aside Cnidathqua enemy into play in the center of all of the locations. For the remainder of the scenario, Cnidathqua is considered to be in play but is not at any location. The lead investigator chooses a Masked Carnevale-Goer in play and flips it to its other side.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - After the mythos phase begins: Choose a Masked Carnevale-Goer in play and flip it to its other side. Objective - If each undefeated investigator is at Canal-side, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Put Gondola into play and move each investigator to it. Then, remove all other locations from the game. Remove from the game each enemy and asset at those locations, as well. η: Test ή or ί (2) to row as hard as you can. If you succeed, place 1 resource from the token bank on this location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Put Gondola into play and move each investigator to it. Then, remove all other locations from the game. Remove from the game each enemy and asset at those locations, as well. η: Test ή or ί (2) to row as hard as you can. If you succeed, place 1 resource from the token bank on this location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Objective - If there are 4π resources on Gondola, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: San Marco Basilica is connected to the location in the clockwise direction.

property.name: Text
property.value: San Marco Basilica is connected to the location in the clockwise direction. η: Place an Innocent Reveler you control underneath the act deck, out of play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Canal-side is connected to the location in the clockwise direction.

property.name: Text
property.value: Canal-side is connected to the location in the clockwise direction. ι After you enter Canal-side: Place 1 clue on Canal-side from the token bank.

property.name: Text
property.value: Streets of Veince is connected to the location in the clockwise direction.

property.name: Text
property.value: Streets of Veince is connected to the location in the clockwise direction. θ: Move (to the location in the clockwise direction).

property.name: Text
property.value: Rialto Bridge is connected to the location in the clockwise direction.

property.name: Text
property.value: Rialto Bridge is connected to the location in the clockwise direction. Forced - After you leave Rialto Bridge: Lose 1 action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Venetian Garden is connected to the location in the clockwise direction.

property.name: Text
property.value: Venetian Garden is connected to the location in the clockwise direction. ηη Spend 2 resources: Heal 2 horror. (Limit once per game.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Bridge of Sighs is connected to the location in the clockwise direction.

property.name: Text
property.value: Bridge of Sighs is connected to the location in the clockwise direction. Forced - After you leave Bridge of Sighs: Take 1 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: Flooded Square is connected to the location in the clockwise direction.

property.name: Text
property.value: Flooded Square is connected to the location in the clockwise direction. η: Automatically evade a non-Elite enemy at the location in the counter-clockwise direction. (Group limit once per turn.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Accademia Bridge is connected to the location in the clockwise direction.

property.name: Text
property.value: Accademia Bridge is connected to the location in the clockwise direction. Forced - After you leave Accademia Bridge: Lose 2 resources.

property.name: Text
property.value: The Guardian is connected to the location in the clockwise direction.

property.name: Text
property.value: The Guardian is connected to the location in the clockwise direction. ι After you enter The Guardian: Draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hunter. While resolving the hunter keyword on Don Lagorio, his location is connected to the location in the counter-clockwise direction, as well as the clockwise direction.

property.name: Text
property.value: η Spend 1 clue: Flip Masked Carnevale-Goer. If its other side is an enemy, it attacks each investigator in its location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Aloof. Forced - When you look at Elisabetta Margo using the ability on Act 1a: Flip her to this side. Forced - When the mythos phase ends: Place 1 doom on Elisabetta Margo.

property.name: Text
property.value: η Spend 1 clue: Flip Masked Carnevale-Goer. If its other side is an enemy, it attacks each investigator in its location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Retaliate. Salvatore Neri's fight value is equal to the attacking investigator's base ή. Salvatore Neri's evade value is equal to the evading investigator's base ί.

property.name: Text
property.value: η Spend 1 clue: Flip Masked Carnevale-Goer. If its other side is an enemy, it attacks each investigator in its location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hunter. While resolving the hunter keyword on Savio Corvi, his location is connected to the location across from him, as well as in the clockwise direction.

property.name: Text
property.value: η Spend 1 clue: Flip Masked Carnevale-Goer. If its other side is an enemy, it attacks each investigator in its location.

property.name: Text
property.value: η: Parley. Test έ (2) to convince the reveler to follow you to safety. If you succeed, take control of Innocent Reveler. Forced - When Innocent Reveler would be discarded: Place it underneath the agenda deck, out of play. Each investigator takes 1 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: η Spend 1 clue: Flip Masked Carnevale-Goer. If its other side is an enemy, it attacks each investigator in its location.

property.name: Text
property.value: θ: Exhaust Abbess Allegria Di Biase: Move from her location to a connecting location, or to her location from a location connected to it. Any investigator may trigger this ability.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limit 1 Mask in play. ι After Bauta enters play: Gain 2 resources. ι When you initiate a non-ή test, discard Bauta: Use ή for this test, instead of the skill indicated.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limit 1 Mask in play. ι After Medico Della Peste enters play: You heal 1 damage or 1 horror. ι When you initiate a non-ά test, discard Medico Della Peste: Use ά for this test, instead of the skill indicated.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limit 1 Mask in play. ι After Pantalone enters play: Draw 2 cards. ι When you initiate a non-έ test, discard Pantalone: Use έ for this test, instead of the skill indicated.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limit 1 Mask in play. ι After Gilded Volto enters play: Treat the next asset you play this turn as if it has fast. ι When you initiate a non-ί test, discard Gilded Volto: Use ί for this test, instead of the skill indicated.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may fight Cnidathqua as if it were at your location (it is not engaged with you). Cnidathqua cannot be evaded. Forced - After you fail a test while attacking Cnidathqua: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Writhing Appendage and spawn it engaged with you. Objective - If Cnidathqua is defeated, (→R2).

property.name: Text
property.value: Spawn - Canal-side. Prey - Most Innocent Revelers controlled. Hunter.

property.name: Text
property.value: Spawn - The location across from you. Retaliate. You cannot look at the other side of Masked Carnevale-Goers at Carnevale Sentinel's location using the ability on Act 1a.

property.name: Text
property.value: Retaliate. Forced - After Writhing Appendage attacks you: Discard a random card from your hand. Forced - When Writhing Appendage is defeated, if Cnidathqua is in play: Deal 1 damage to Cnidathqua.

property.name: Text
property.value: Peril. Revelation - You must either take 2 damage or take each Masked Carnevale-Goer, shuffle them so the investigators do not know which is which, and place 1 in each location, starting with the location clockwise from you (Masked Carnevale-Goer side face-up).

property.name: Text
property.value: Peril. Revelation - You must either take 2 horror or move to the location across from you.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Test ά (4). Each investigator who controls an Innocent Reveler must also perform this skill test. Each investigator who fails takes 1 horror, which must be assigned to Innocent Reveler first, if able.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Test ί (4). Each investigator who controls an Innocent Reveler must also perform this skill test. Each investigator who fails takes 1 damage, which must be assinged to an Innocent Reveler first, if able.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - If there are no Masked Carnevale-Goers at your location, Mesmerize gains surge. If there is a Masked Carnevale-Goer at your location, flip it. If it is an Innocent Reveler, move it to the farthest location clockwise from you with no investigators, then deal it 1 damage and 1 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Test ά (3). If you fail, you must either lose all of your resources or choose and discard an Ally asset you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Attach to the nearest location in the clockwise direction with no Acrid Miasma. Forced - After an investigator enters attached location, he or she tests ά (2). If failed, that investigator must either take 1 damage and 1 horror, or resolve the hunter keyword on each enemy in play.
